channel.title: Performance Evaluation on Xu Zhe's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Performance Evaluation on Xu Zhe's Blog

item.title: Machine Learning Performance Evaluation Metrics
item.description: Type Name Definition Comments Classification Accuracy number of correctly identified instances / all instances Not ideal for skewed data. Not ideal for situations that you care one classification more than the rest. For example, if you create a model to predict cancer, you may care more about whether the people have cancer other than he does not. Classification Precision True Positive / (True Positive + False Positive) Out of all the items labeled as positive, how many truly belong to the positive class.
